response.original_title: 余命一年の僕が、余命半年の君と出会った話。
response.overview: With only a year left to live, 17-year-old Akito finds new meaning in life by bringing joy to a terminally ill girl who has just six months remaining.
response.title: Drawing Closer

titles.title: Yomei Ichinen no Boku ga, Yomei Hantoshi no Kimi to Deatta Hanashi
